result.reason: The issue lacks concrete acceptance criteria and up-to-date validation, and recent triage explicitly requests retesting on v1.79.x with reproducible expected-versus-actual behavior.
result.approach: Request a fresh test on the latest fork/upstream build plus specific KiTTY integration requirements (supported executable options, session mapping, and UI behavior), then re-scope for implementation.
